name: DisplayedRoomTemp
comment: Aktuelle Raumtemperatur

name: RoomTemp
comment: raw value current room temperature and sensorstate (without any correction)

name: OutsideTemp
comment: Außentemperatur und Sensorstatus

name: ActualWeekday
comment: Aktueller Wochentag

name: Time
comment: Aktuelle Uhrzeit

name: Date
comment: Aktuelles Datum

name: StatusDcf
comment: status of the DCF signal (0x00 = no DCF-Signal detected / no RTC value; 0x01 = DCF-signal detected; 0x02 = DCF-signal is being interpreted; 0x03 = DCF-data valid; 0x04 = RTC-data is valid)

name: IsInHoliday
comment: Urlaub aktiv

name: Hc1OPMode
comment: operation mode of the heating circuit

name: Hc1NightTemp
comment: Absenktemperatur des Heizkreises

name: Hc1ManualOPRoomTempDesired
comment: room setpoint in operation mode manual of the heating circuit

name: Hc1QuickVetoTemp
comment: manual override setpoint of the heating circuit

name: Hc1QuickVetoActive
comment: manual override of the heating circuit enabled

name: NameHc
comment: labelling of the heating circuit

name: NameHwc
comment: labelling of the domestic hot water circuit

name: HolidayRoomTemp
comment: 4.5=frostprotect, room setpoint during holidays

name: HolidayStartPeriod
comment: start date of holidays

name: HolidayEndPeriod
comment: Datum Ferienende

name: HwcOPMode
comment: operation mode of the domestic hot water circuit

name: HwcTempDesired
comment: setpoint of domestic hot water circuit

name: HwcQuickVetoTemp
comment: manual override setpoint for the domestic hot water circuit

name: HwcQuickVetoActive
comment: manual override of the domestic hot water circuit enabled

name: HwcManualOPTempDesired
comment: setpoint of domestic hot water circuit in manual operation mode

name: SummerWinterTimeAdjust
comment: enable automatic switching over to daylight saving's time (when a DCF receiver is connected to the BMU the value is set fix to ON)

name: DisplayedHwcStorageTemp
comment: display of the storage's temperature in C4 (also in case of an SP1 error)

name: DisplayedHc1RoomTempDesired
comment: 0= >5°C, currently displayed room temperature setpoint

name: RoomTempCorrection
comment: Korrekturwert der Raumtemperaturanzeige

name: Hc12stepanalogCtrl
comment: Zweipunktregelung

name: Hc1LineMatchingAdaption
comment: Abgleich Regelstrecke

name: Hc1ActualFlowTempDesired
comment: calculated flow temperature setpoint of the heating circuit

name: HwcLegioStartDay
comment: Wochentag an dem die Legionellenschutzfunktion gestartet wird (evt. auch täglich)

name: HwcLegioStartTime
comment: time on which legionella protection is started

name: HwcCircuitActive
comment: Warmwasserkreis ist eingeschaltet

name: PhoneNumber1
comment: first part of the installer's telephone number

name: PhoneNumber2
comment: second part of the installer's telephone number

name: KeyCodeforConfigMenu
comment: code for the installer's menues

name: MaintenanceDate
comment: Datum nächste Wartung

name: LcdContrastValue
comment: setting of the LCD contrast

name: CirPump
comment: circulation pump's state

name: HwcActualTempDesired
comment: current domestic hot water setpoint

name: StartEepromUpdate
comment: update of the EEPROM is to be started

name: EepromUpdateActive
comment: update of the EEPROM has been started

name: RoomTempOffsetSelfWarming
comment: room temperature intrinsic heating offset

name: CountryVariant
comment: country variant (0 = west, 1 = east)

name: ActualRoomTempDesiredHc1
comment: current room setpoint considering all basic conditions passed to the control algorithms

name: HRUDetected
comment: indicates that an airvent module / a heat recovery unit has been detected

name: ACTOstorDetected
comment: indicates that an ACTOstor has been detected

name: BMUB51101ErrorStatus
comment: error state of BMU received via eBUS service B51101

name: BMUB51101StorageTemp
comment: hot water storage temperature received via eBUS service B5 11 01

name: LegioProtectActive
comment: legionella protection is active

name: BMUB51101HwcState
comment: flame is on because of either tapping or tank loading

name: EnermanState
comment: current energy-manager-state (Off = 0, Heating = 1, DHW = 2, DHW pump lag = 3)

name: CPLPLast24started
comment: circulation respectively loading pump has been started during the last 24h

name: B51000FlowSetMonitor
comment: flow temperature setpoint sent via B5 10 00 to the BMU

name: B51000HcDisableMonitor
comment: copy of the M12 byte of the B5 10 00 service containing the disable bits

name: B51000M7OpModeMonitor
comment: operation mode sent via B5 10 00 (0 = auto, 1 = forced off, 2 = forced CH, 3 = forced DHW)

name: B51000M10HwcFlowSetMon
comment: flow setpoint DHW sent via B5 10 00

name: B51000M12DisableBitsMon
comment: bits 0-7: disable CH/disable DHW tapping/disable DHW tank loading/not used/clear burner blocking DHW/dis, disable bits sent via B5 10 00 (leftmost bit 0, rightmost bit 7)

name: B51000M14Monitor
comment: bits 0-7: remote control CH pump/release backup heater/release cooling/not used/left stop position DHW o, bits sent in M14 of B5 10 00 (leftmost bit 0, rightmost bit 7; relevant is bit 0: remote control of CH pump)

name: ChimneySweepModeActive
comment: chimney sweep mode has been enabled by the BMU

name: HwcLoadingInBMUActive
comment: indicates that BMU is in DHW preparation

name: MonitorEEpromInkonsiNumber
comment: identification of the last eight EEPROM inconsistencies

name: AssertFileName
comment: shows, if assert is enabled, the name of the module where the 'assert fail' occured

name: AssertLineNumber
comment: assert fail occured in this line
